General.Name: Ok Biotech Co Ltd
General.Description: OK Biotech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells blood glucose meters worldwide. It also provides nebulizers, glucometers, blood sugar meters, blood glucose test strips, and personal sound amplifiers. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 91, Gongdao 5th Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30070

2.Name: De Quan Zhang
2.Title: Chief Operating Officer, Deputy Gen. Mang., Director
